typeOrPaste: Type or paste a raw text and the intelligent engine will output a polished text in seconds.
proseNinjaDesc: Prose Ninja is the perfect companion for writers, students, professionals, and anyone who wants to write with ease and style. Our intelligent engine helps you create beautiful text that resonates with your audience.
subscriptionEndingText: Your subscription is ending soon, but you still have access to premium features. Would you like to re-subscribe?
aiPoweredText: This is an AI-powered application. The translations are generated by machine learning models and might not be 100% accurate.
useOfSiteText: Use of this site constitutes acceptance of our
termsIntro: These Terms of Service ('Terms') govern your access to and use of our services, including our various websites, APIs, applications, and other services (the 'Services'), and any information, text, graphics, or other materials uploaded, downloaded, or appearing on the Services (collectively referred to as 'Content'). By accessing and using the Services, you agree to be bound by these Terms.
basicTermsDesc: You are responsible for your use of the Services and for any Content you provide, including compliance with applicable laws, rules, and regulations. You should only provide Content that you are comfortable sharing with others.
privacyDesc: Our Services are designed to avoid the need for you to share sensitive personal information. Do NOT submit sensitive personal data to our Services, including but not limited to Social Security numbers, driver's license numbers, bank account details, credit card numbers, passwords, medical information, or any other information that could be used for identity theft or other fraudulent purposes.
contentAndDataProcessingDesc: When you submit text for processing, you understand and accept that your text is sent to OpenAI's servers for processing. Our Service, through OpenAI, makes use of sophisticated language models that 'read' the text you input and generate responses based on that input. It's important to note that OpenAI does not store your input data for more than 30 days.
yourRightsDesc: You retain your rights to any Content you submit, post, or display on or through the Services.
restrictions: Restrictions on Content and Use of the Services
restrictionsDesc: We reserve the right at all times (but will not have an obligation) to remove or refuse to distribute any Content on the Services, to suspend or terminate users, and to reclaim usernames without liability to you.
liabilityAndWarrantyDesc: The Services are provided 'as is' without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including, but not limited to, the implied warranties of title, non-infringement, integration, merchantability, and fitness for a particular purpose, and any warranties implied by any course of performance or usage of trade, all of which are expressly disclaimed.
amendmentsDesc: We reserve the right to modify or replace these Terms at any time. Your use of the Services following the posting of any changes to these Terms constitutes acceptance of those changes.
contactDesc: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at support@prose.ninja
validEmail: Please enter a valid email address.

freeUserMessage: As a free user, you get 1 text submission a day. Please subscribe for 9 EUR a month in order to use it fully.

applicationDescription: This application allows you to enhance your text using AI. Simply enter your text, choose your parameters, and click Submit.
shortReplyPrompt: In short, what do you want to reply?

infoShare: How Information About You Is Shared

privacyImportance: Your privacy is critically important to us. We adhere to the following principles to protect your privacy:
notAskInfo: We don’t ask for your personal information unless we truly need it.
notShareInfo: We don’t share your personal information with anyone except to comply with the law or protect our rights.
notStoreInfo: We don’t store personal information on our servers unless required for the ongoing operation of one of our services.
